backend/main.mo: Defines authorization, user approval, role types, data models, and data stores for announcements, homework, routines, class times, and locking logic for sections and items.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, styles, and lock-control functionality.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS variables and theme styles for light and dark modes along with base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that mounts the React app and loads the main TypeScript entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router with guarded routes, authentication checks, and app layout handling.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication context for session role, username, login/logout functions, and admin/editor permissions.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Implements localStorage-backed session persistence with helpers for saving, loading, and clearing session data.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component providing navigation, header, footer, and responsive drawer for the app.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Visual lock/unlock icon with tooltip indicating content lock state.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary class that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Fallback screen shown on runtime errors with reload option and optional debug info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: React Query hooks for reading and updating master, section, and item-level content locks via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on applications, announcements, homework, routines, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme with school-themed colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard that manages user applications, role changes, and lock controls while displaying announcements, homework, routines, and class times.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Provides an admin login form with password validation and redirects authenticated admins to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest class routine grouped by day with lock status and handles loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Allows viewing, adding, editing, and deleting class time entries with lock checks and per-item editing dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing announcements, routines, role info, quick links, and admin-only overview cards including lock status and pending approvals.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Manages homework creation, editing, deletion, and viewing with lock controls and per-item restrictions.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Displays and manages announcements with add, edit, delete, and locking features using backend mutations and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Shows a pending-approval notice for users awaiting admin review and allows logging out.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Presents role selection cards (student, visitor, admin) that navigate to corresponding login or application pages.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Handles student application submission with form validation and displays a confirmation screen after submitting.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Provides a simple student login form that authenticates locally and redirects to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Implements a password-gated visitor login with optional password visibility and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, architecture notes, issues, and a list of implemented features for a role-based school website.
